core_principles: Fusion: Military HUD precision meets Crypto Degen energy
Contrast: Void Black backgrounds vs. Blinding Neon data
Density: High-density data grids for the dashboard, cinematic asymmetry for the landing page

glassmorphism.usage: Overlays, Sticky Headers, Floating Action Panels

tracing_beam.description: Animated gradient border for active trades
tracing_beam.implementation: Use a parent div with 'relative overflow-hidden' and a child 'absolute inset-0' with a conic-gradient animation.

grid_borders.usage: Dashboard data cells, creating a 'Technical' look

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#9945FF] to-[#14F195] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:opacity-90 clip-path-polygon-[0_0,100%_0,100%_70%,90%_100%,0_100%]
buttons.secondary: border border-[#14F195] text-[#14F195] hover:bg-[#14F195]/10 uppercase tracking-widest

landing_page.hero_section: col-span-full md:col-span-8 row-span-2 relative overflow-hidden rounded-none border border-white/10
landing_page.stats_section: col-span-4 row-span-1 bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 p-6

dashboard.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4 h-screen overflow-hidden
dashboard.sidebar: hidden md:flex col-span-1 flex-col border-r border-white/10 bg-black/50

charts.style: AreaChart with gradient fills. Stroke width 2px. No grid lines (or very subtle opacity 0.05).

tables.style: Compact, monospace font for numbers. Row hover: bg-white/5. Border-b border-white/5.

images.description: Abstract neon lines on dark background. Use with overlay opacity-50.
Digital landscape wireframe. Use as background for the 'Whale Watch' card.
Solana Coin 3D. Use in the payment modal or pricing section.
Cyberpunk operative. Use in the 'About' or 'Security' section.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text unless it's a massive headline.
DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Stick to rounded-none, rounded-sm, or rounded-md for a 'military' feel.
React Files: Use .js extension (JSX syntax inside).
Export: Named exports for components, Default exports for pages.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update index.css with the provided CSS variables. 2. Install 'framer-motion' and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge'. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar/header structure. 4. Build the Dashboard using the 'High Density Grid' strategy. 5. Build the Landing Page using the 'Tetris Grid' strategy.
